channel.title: LyDian Discovery â€“ New AI Models
channel.description: Curated feed of new AI/LLM models from HuggingFace, arXiv, Open LLM Leaderboard, ModelScope, and official catalogs. Updated daily by LyDian AI Discovery.
channel.generator: LyDian AI Discovery Feed Generator v1.0.0
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025 LyDian AI. Feed licensed under CC BY 4.0.

item.title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet - Anthropic
item.dc:creator: Anthropic
item.description: Claude 3.5 Sonnet with improved coding, reasoning, and visual capabilities. 200K context window. Benchmarks: MMLU 88.7, HumanEval 92.0, Math 78.3. Tags: multimodal, coding, reasoning, large-context. License: proprietary.

item.title: GPT-4 Turbo - OpenAI
item.dc:creator: OpenAI
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with 128K context window and improved performance. Optimized for complex multi-step tasks. Benchmarks: MMLU 86.4, HumanEval 88.0. Tags: multimodal, large-context, instruction-following. License: proprietary.

item.title: Gemini 1.5 Pro - Google
item.dc:creator: Google
item.description: Gemini 1.5 Pro with 1M token context window. Native multimodal understanding across text, images, video, and audio. Benchmarks: MMLU 85.9, Math 81.0, HumanEval 84.7. Tags: multimodal, ultra-long-context, video-understanding. License: proprietary.

item.title: Llama 3.1 405B Instruct - Meta
item.dc:creator: Meta
item.description: Meta's largest open-source LLM with 405B parameters. Instruction-tuned for general tasks with 128K context. Benchmarks: MMLU 85.2, HumanEval 84.0, GSM8K 89.0. Downloads: 450K, Likes: 3.2K. Tags: open-source, large-scale, instruction-following. License: llama-3.1-community.

item.title: Mixtral-8x22B-Instruct-v0.1 - Mistral AI
item.dc:creator: Mistral AI
item.description: Mixture of Experts model with 141B total parameters (39B active). Open-weight model with strong performance. Benchmarks: MMLU 77.8, HumanEval 75.3, GSM8K 74.0. Downloads: 125K, Likes: 1.25K. Tags: mixture-of-experts, open-weights, multilingual. License: apache-2.0.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3 - DeepSeek
item.dc:creator: DeepSeek
item.description: DeepSeek's MoE model with 671B total parameters (37B active). Competitive with GPT-4 on many benchmarks. Benchmarks: MMLU 83.5, HumanEval 81.0, Math 76.2. Downloads: 67K, Likes: 750. Tags: mixture-of-experts, open-weights, cost-efficient. License: mit.

item.title: Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct - Alibaba Cloud
item.dc:creator: Alibaba Cloud
item.description: Qwen2.5 series with 72B parameters. Strong multilingual and code generation capabilities. Benchmarks: MMLU 82.3, HumanEval 77.8, GSM8K 84.0. Downloads: 89K, Likes: 980. Tags: multilingual, coding, open-weights. License: apache-2.0.

item.title: Stable Diffusion 3.5 Large - Stability AI
item.dc:creator: Stability AI
item.description: Latest Stable Diffusion model with 8B parameters. Improved text rendering and prompt following. Downloads: 230K, Likes: 2.1K. Tags: text-to-image, diffusion, open-weights. License: stabilityai-community.

item.title: FLUX.1-dev - Black Forest Labs
item.dc:creator: Black Forest Labs
item.description: State-of-the-art open-weights text-to-image model. Exceptional prompt following and image quality. Downloads: 185K, Likes: 1.85K. Tags: text-to-image, open-weights, high-quality. License: apache-2.0.

item.title: Command R+ - Cohere
item.dc:creator: Cohere
item.description: Cohere's flagship model optimized for enterprise RAG and tool use. Strong multilingual capabilities. Benchmarks: MMLU 79.5, HumanEval 72.0. Tags: enterprise, rag-optimized, multilingual, tool-use. License: proprietary.
